name: The Legend of Studentenfutter
description:
This game has been created within 48 hours for the RocketBeans Community Gamejam (rbcgj).

Eddy the peanut is a friendly guy who loves to spent time together with his firends: Rosina the raisin, Bernhardt the almond, Lord William Cashew II and Jeremy the brazil not from Brazil. They lived together in a small bag, also known as "Tescos mixed nuts". One day a lazy student came by and took the 5 friends into a dark forest. Unfortunately he dropped the bag and left the nuts behind. Suddenly our friends heard a noise from outside: a giant creature with sharp claws reached into the bag and grabbed Eddys friends! A squirrel took them all!

Eddy needed all his dignity and courage in order to follow the beast into his nest. Now it's up to you to help him find his friends and save the day!
